title: Not a member yet?
content:
If you’re interested in our distinctive wines—or a visit to our equally distinctive Estate winery—please sign up for our List. Our commitment to quality over quantity necessarily limits our production, so there is typically a wait period to get on the List. We beg your understanding and patience, and look forward to welcoming you into the Williams Selyem family. We trust you will find it worth the wait.
Already a List member? Go to My Account.
